long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simulates what it's like living in Justin Trudeaus Canada if Bill C-11 passes

Please go here to sign a petition to stop this bill: https://www.killbillc11.ca/

This extension requires lots of permissions to do what it does, after you are done with it just right click on the Canada flag icon and click remove from Chrome.

This extension replaces all images and redirects youtube videos. It's just for fun, and collects zero data! Use it for a few minutes and then delete it ;p

Here is a good video from a Youtuber that goes into more detail about why the bill is not great for content creators: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZN5kZPs1XSw
